analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0x324bcf93e807a0fd74b1469aace621514b5a4efc.sol#85-103) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/34/0x324bcf93e807a0fd74b1469aace621514b5a4efc.sol#97-102)
